meanings.definition: The study of the size, shape, and structure of skulls.
meanings.sent1: In craniology, scientists examine the different shapes of skulls.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in craniology analyze the sizes of various skulls.
meanings.sent3: The class on craniology was so interesting that it made me want to study skulls too!
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in craniology allowed her to identify the skull with just a glance.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on craniology showcased skulls from around the world.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the skull and its development.
meanings.sent1: Craniology involves studying how skulls develop over time.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use craniology to understand the structure of the human skull.
meanings.sent3: The craniology lab was filled with models of skulls at different stages of growth.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to craniology led to groundbreaking discoveries about skull development.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on craniology provided detailed insights into skull formation.
